name: A sad bug tale
description:
Text adventure game.

A very short story about, you guessed it, a bug.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Only Linux is supported.

If you have a desire to play this on windows, please let me know. It is an alpha project mainly develop to test my game engine.

Roughly 2 weeks went into development of the engine. So do not expect much of it. I hope at least some of you have fun with it.

Developed with SBCL.
